sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Grid, Button, Container, Divider, Header, Icon, Segment, Item, Menu, Tab, Loader } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import { MotorPolicyContext } from '../../../context/policy/motor'; import { GET_MOTOR_POLICY } from '../queries' export default function MotorPolicy(props) { const [motorPolicy, setMotorPolicy] = useState({}); const context = useContext(MotorPolicyContext); const policyId = props.match.params.policyId const { loading, data: motorPolicyData } = useQuery(GET_MOTOR_POLICY, { variables: { id: policyId } }); useEffect(() => { if (motorPolicyData) { setMotorPolicy(motorPolicyData.motorPolicy); } }, [motorPolicyData, motorPolicy, context]); function motorPolicyDetails() { return ( {loading ? : {motorPolicy.id &&
Client details
 Basic Information Name: {motorPolicy.individualClient.firstName} {motorPolicy.individualClient.lastName} {motorPolicy.individualClient.surname}
Email: {motorPolicy.individualClient.email}
Phone Number: {motorPolicy.individualClient.phoneNumber}
ID Number: {motorPolicy.individualClient.idNumber}
kra Pin: {motorPolicy.individualClient.kraPin}
 Policy Information Policy Number: {motorPolicy.policyNo}
Debit Note Number: {motorPolicy.debitNoteNo}
Insurance Class: {motorPolicy.insuranceClass}
Insurance Company: {motorPolicy.insuranceCompany.name}
Transaction Type: {motorPolicy.transactionType}
Start Date: {motorPolicy.startDate}
End Date: {motorPolicy.endDate}
Renewal Date: {motorPolicy.renewalDate || "None"}
Transaction Date: {motorPolicy.transactionDate}
Vehicle details
 Basic Information Registration Number: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.registrationNo}
Year of Manufacture: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.yearOfManufacture}
Model: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.model}
Make: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.make}
Body: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.body}
Color: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.color}
CC: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.cc.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
Chassis Number: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.chasselNo}
Engine Number: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.engineNo}
Tonnage: {motorPolicy.vehicleDetails.tonnage}
Value: Ksh {motorPolicy.value.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
} {motorPolicy.remarks &&
Remarks
} } ) } function premiumDetails() { return ( {motorPolicy.id &&
Basic Premium
 Basic Premiums Info Premium Type: {motorPolicy.premiumType}
Commission Rate: {motorPolicy.commissionRate}%
Minimum Premium Amount: Ksh {motorPolicy.minimumPremiumAmount.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
Amount: Ksh {motorPolicy.premiums.basicPremium.amount.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
{!!motorPolicy.additionalPremiums.length &&
Additional Premiums
 {motorPolicy.additionalPremiums.map((premium, i) => ( .{i + 1}. Premium Type: {premium.label}
{premium.commissionRate && Commission Rate: {premium.commissionRate + "%"}
} Amount: Ksh {motorPolicy.premiums.AdditionalPremiums[i].amount.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
))} } {(motorPolicy.additionalBenefits && !!motorPolicy.additionalBenefits.length) &&
Additional Benefits
 {motorPolicy.additionalBenefits.map((benefit, i) => ( .{i + 1}. Benefit Type: {benefit.label}
Commission Rate: {benefit.commissionRate ? benefit.commissionRate + "%" : ""}
{benefit.minimumAmount && Minimum Benefit Amount: Ksh {benefit.minimumAmount.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
} Amount: Ksh {motorPolicy.premiums.AdditionalBenefits[i].amount.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
))} } } {motorPolicy.id &&


Policy Premium Totals
 {/* {motorPolicy.premiums.basicPremium && Basic Premium Totals} */} {/* Name: {motorPolicy.premiums.basicPremium.name}
*/} Net Premium:Ksh {motorPolicy.premiums.netPremiums.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
Gross Premium:Ksh {motorPolicy.premiums.totalPremiums.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}

Gross Commission: Ksh {motorPolicy.premiums.grossCommission.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
Net Commission: Ksh {motorPolicy.premiums.netCommission.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
{/* Total Premiums Amount */} {/* {!!motorPolicy.additionalPremiums.length && Additional Premium Totals {motorPolicy.premiums.AdditionalBenefits.map((benefit, i) => (
Name: {benefit.name}
Total Amount: Ksh {benefit.amount.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
))} } {(motorPolicy.premiums.AdditionalBenefits && !!motorPolicy.premiums.AdditionalBenefits.length) ? {motorPolicy.premiums.AdditionalBenefits && Additional Benefit Totals} {motorPolicy.premiums.AdditionalBenefits.map((benefit, i) => (
Name: {benefit.name}
Total Amount: Ksh {benefit.amount.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",")}
))} : ""} */}
} ) } const panes = [ { menuItem: ( Motor Policy Details ), render: () => { return ( {motorPolicyDetails()} ) }, }, { menuItem: ( Premiums Details ), render: () => { return ( {premiumDetails()} ) }, } ] return (
Policies {'>'} General {'>'} Motor {'>'} Policy Details Hey there {'User'}, find a list of motor policies under General Insurance below
{motorPolicy && } ) }
